TutoExplainContent: Collect the letters of the target word shown in top left in correct order. Warning: you have to move without getting drowned in ponds!
TutoHomeContent: Click Play to start the game, click Settings to customize the list of words
TutoWelcomeContent: Welcome in the Falabracman activity. Falabracman is an addictive game where you should collect letter to build words
TutoRestartContent: Click here to go back to home and restart the game
TutoGameContent: Use keyboard arrows or drag mouse in a direction to move the falabracman. Falabracman can only move in four directions i.e. NORTH, EAST, WEST, SOUTH
TutoSettingContent: In this screen, you can make your own custom dictionary of words
TutoDictContent: Here the current list of words in the dictionary. You could filter this list by typing text in the word-bar
TutoWordInputContent: Enter the word which you want to search or add or delete or edit
TutoAddWordContent: Click this button to add word you have entered in your word-bar
TutoDeleteAllWordsContent: Click this button to delete all words. Only one default word will be there after this
TutoSaveDictContent: Click this button to save changes you have made. Without clicking this button your changes will get lost
TutoResetDictContent: Click this button to reset the dictionary to the default one
TutoReturnContent: Click this button to Return to Home Screen
TutoAddStepContent: (1) Enter the word in word-bar (2) Click Add (3) Click Save
TutoDeleteStepTitle: Steps To Delete an existing Word
TutoDeleteStepContent: (1) Enter the word in word-bar (2) Click the delete icon in dictionary section (3) Click Save
TutoEditStepTitle: Steps To Edit an existing Word
TutoEditStepContent: (1) Enter the word in word-bar (2) Click the edit icon in dictionary section (3) Write the new edited word in word-bar (4) Click 'okay icon (5) Click Save
